n:
Anita and team are making a series of videos on [feminism and gaming](http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/566429325/tropes-vs-women-in-video-games). I gave them $25 a year ago, and the two releases so far are really good.

Anyway, here's an example of the typical response they get from a vocal segment of the gaming community.
d: Twitter vs Female Protagonists in Video Games
